timeline.message: Updated client builders to set return-client-request-id instead of the x-ms-* variant
Update test to pass in playback

timeline.bodyText: @alzimmermsft In the next month or so, we'll be deploying a service update that will set both client-request-id and x-ms-client-request-id on the response if either return-client-request-id or x-ms-return-client-request-id is specified.
timeline.author: brjohnstmsft
